description: Public Services & Procurement Canada (PSPC) has solicited the installation of new chillers for the Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada AAFC Research and Development Centre at Lethbridge, Alberta.
full_summary:
**New Chiller Installation**
===============

**Agency:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
---------------

**Location:** Lethbridge Research and Development Centre,  Lethbridge, Alberta
------------------------

**Synopsis:** Public Services & Procurement Canada (PSPC) is seeking a contractor to deliver a project for the renovation and replacement of two chillers at the Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada (AAFC) Research and Development Centre in Lethbridge, Alberta.

**Scope of Work:** The work includes the demolition and disposal of the existing chillers and the supply and install of new replacement chillers. Hazardous waste disposal costs should be considered.

**Contact Information:**

* Contractor: Mike Fagan
* Email: [mike.fagan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:mike.fagan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Bid Submission:** 
Bids must be submitted by September 1, 2023 at 2:00 p.m. Eastern Daylight Time (EDT). Any bids submitted after this time will be considered non-responsive.

**Contract Details:**

* Solicitation Number: WS4095782827
* Tender Reference Number: WS4095782827
* Amendment Number: 3
* Publication Date: July 20, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: September 1, 2023

**Business Requirements:**

* Lowest Price: Selection Criteria
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Alberta-based contractors encouraged to participate

Please visit the CanadaBuys and Ariba Discovery websites for further details or to submit a proposal.  
http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16934457?extsite=MTY5MzQ0NTdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
